step.heading: Introduction
step.content: This document details the procedure for installing a bicycle stem. It outlines preliminary requirements, the main procedure, and closing requirements.

subsection.heading: Safety Precautions
subsection.caution: Do not overtighten the stem bolt. Overtightening can damage the headset bearings.
The stem bolt does not secure the stem.
subsection.note: Ensure the stem is aligned forward in line with the wheel.

subsection.heading: Prerequisites
subsection.content: Ensure the bicycle is securely mounted on a work stand with the front wheel free of the ground.

subsection.heading: Step: Cleaning
subsection.content: Remove all rust and corrosion using a clean dry cloth and rubbing alcohol.

item.content: Apply general lubricant to the following:

list.li: The threads of the stem and stem bolt.

item.content: (Image placeholder – See original document for actual image)
Install the stem into the steerer tube.
(Image placeholder – See original document for actual image)
Adjust the stem to align with the wheel. Firmly tighten the stem bolt.

subsection.content: Install the handlebars (refer to document: <xref href="data:text/plain;base64,S1000DBIKEAAA DA220000AA720A" />).
